resources.string:
Butter chicken, a creamy Indian delicacy, features tender chicken pieces
marinated in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices, then cooked and simmered in a rich tomato-
based sauce infused with butter, cream, onions, and cashew nuts. Garnished with cilantro
leaves, it's a delectable dish renowned for its harmonious blend of flavors and
textures.
